data.text: A Yave ngeyo wuthomba ayi ngeyo wunzebi.
Ngeyo zebi thangu ndidi wuvuanda
Ngeyo zebi thangu ndieti totuka
Tuamina mambu maba va ludimi luama,
Ngeyo wunzungididi ku manima ayi ku ntuala
Nzayilu yi phila yoyi, yididi ngolo
Kuevi ndilenda kuenda suamina phevi aku e ?
Enati khumini ku Diyilu, ngeyo widi kuna ;
Enati khumini mu mavavi ma nkielo buisi ;
buna kuna diaka, koko kuaku kuela kundiatisa ;
Enati khembi : “Bukiedika tombi kiela kutsueka”
Muaki tombi kilendi ba tombi kuidi ngeyo ko ;
Ngeyo wuvanga binama biama bi khati nitu ;
Ndikuzitisa bila ndidi vangu ki tsisi ayi kitsiminanga ;
Khubukulu ama yi mimvesi yisia suama va ntualꞌaku ko
Meso maku mamona nitu ama yikambu kubuku.
A phila thalu mayindu maku kuidi minu, a Nzambi !
Enati thidi ku matanga ;
Enati ngeyo wuzola kaka vonda mutu wumbimbi, a Nzambi !
Beti kuyolukila mu zikhanu zimbimbi ;
Buevi, ndilendi lenda ko bobo beti kulenda, a Yave ?
Ndisi kadi diambu ko vayi kikhenene kaka ndidi kuidi bawu ;
Wumfiongunina, a Nzambi, ayi zaba ndimꞌama ;
Tala kani nzila yimbimbi yidi mu minu
